# thesisdownrli

---
# Why Bother?

.pull-left[
- Write in markdown (simple control of some text elements)

- LaTeX templates

- Incorporate **R** code (if you want)

- Properly formatted equations 

- Automatic numbering of equations/figures/tables

- Use BibTeX references and Zotero
]

.pull-right[
- Can produce single chapter for supervisor

- Works with version control

- More reproducible than Word

- Not as fussy as LaTeX
]

---
# How does it work?

- Install package (and dependencies)

--

- Create new project or R markdown file

    - Produces template files for chapters
    
    - Template bibliography file
    
    - central `index.Rmd` file to hold it all together

- [Github repo](https://github.com/aj2duncan/thesisdownrli)

- [Documentation](https://aj2duncan.github.io/thesisdownrli)
